synopsis.text: Ambitious light novelist Itsuki Hashima is a self-proclaimed little sister enthusiast, dedicating his writing to crafting the perfect little sister character. Surrounded by a diverse and eccentric group of friends, Itsuki navigates the challenges of life and the publishing industry. Among his circle are Chihiro, his seemingly flawless stepbrother with a hidden secret; Nayuta Kani, a talented yet perverted illustrator harboring feelings for Itsuki; Haruto Fuwa, a fellow successful male author; and Miyako Shirakawa, a college friend who assumes a sisterly role. Together, they share laughter, spontaneous adventures, and the occasional drink, while also facing their own personal struggles. As Itsuki continues his quest for the ideal little sister, he learns valuable lessons about life and relationships.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
